resources.string: Md. Mizanor Rahman Nayeem\n A Member of PSB 57th Family

Why PSB Routine App?\n\nAlthough we have a PDF routine, using an app provides several advantages. With varying class schedules every day, it becomes necessary to check the routine regularly. However, the PDF routine, containing schedules for three semesters in a table layout, can be tedious and uninspiring. This is where the PSB Routine app comes in, offering a visually distinct semester schedule, making it easy to locate one\'s own schedule. By doing so, the app saves valuable time while providing a premium user experience.

Dear Valued Users,

I would like to express my sincerest gratitude to each and every one of you. As the founder of AgnCom, I am proud to present my first designed and developed app, now available for download on the Google Play Store.

As with any new venture, there may be imperfections and mistakes in the initial release. However, I humbly ask for your kindness and forgiveness as we work to improve and refine the app for your satisfaction.

Should you have any inquiries or suggestions, please do not hesitate to reach out to me at mrnayeem1309@gmail.com. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us deliver the best possible user experience.

Lastly, I want to extend my deepest appreciation to all those who have supported and encouraged me throughout this journey. Your encouragement has been instrumental in making this dream a reality.

Thank you again for your trust in AgnCom and our PSB Routine app.

Sincerely,
Md. Mizanor Rahman Nayeem

e-mail: mrnayeem1309@gmail.com
